title: Pytorch Bert -Plain
description: This is mostly a copy of Aditya Soni's kernel with some small changes . This is nothing complicated . I just wanted to learn BERT and played around with the basics . The training was done in colab . If you want to use the Kernel for training , just change the last parameter to True in Pipeline Config . This was taken from Combat-Wombat team in Toxicity .
